Package de.variantsync.matching.raqun.similarity

Interface ISimilarityFunction

All Known Implementing Classes:
WeightMetric
public interface ISimilarityFunction
A SimilarityFunction is applied to determine whether elements should be matched, and in order to sort pairs of match candidates.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default double
    getMatchConfidence​(CandidatePair candidatePair)
    Calculate the confidence that two elements in the CandidatePair should be matched

    Calculate the confidence that two elements should be matched to each other

    shouldMatch​(Set<RMatch> tuples)
    Determine whether a set of given tuples should be matched

  • Method Details

    • shouldMatch

      boolean shouldMatch​(Set<RMatch> tuples)
      Determine whether a set of given tuples should be matched
      Parameters:
      tuples - the tuples that are considered
      Returns:
      true, if the elements of all given tuples should be matched

    • setNumberOfModels

      void setNumberOfModels​(int numberOfModels)
      Parameters:
      numberOfModels - The total number of models considered for matching

    • getMatchConfidence

      double getMatchConfidence​(RElement elementA, RElement elementB)
      Calculate the confidence that two elements should be matched to each other
      Parameters:
      elementA - first element
      elementB - second element
      Returns:
      A double value for the confidence. A greater value corresponds to a greater similarity of the two elements, hence, a higher confidence that they should be matched

    • getMatchConfidence

      default double getMatchConfidence​(CandidatePair candidatePair)
      Calculate the confidence that two elements in the CandidatePair should be matched
      Parameters:
      candidatePair - pair of two possible match candidates
      Returns:
      A double value for the confidence. A greater value corresponds to a greater similarity of the two elements, hence, a higher confidence that they should be matched
